front.title: Multimedia Internet KEYing (MIKEY) General Extension Payload for Open Mobile Alliance BCAST 1.0

abstract.t: This document extends the General Extension Payload for OMA BCAST usage defined in RFC 4909 [1]. It adds necessary support for the newly specified management data as defined in the Open Mobile Alliance's (OMA) Broadcast (BCAST) group's Service and Content protection specification [2].
